title: Active Math Learning Design Through Outcomes-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic and basic algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment optimized for smartphone-based activities, where learners primarily demand practical job-focused education applicable immediately in professional settings

learning_goals: Learners can understand the core principles of Outcomes-Based Education (OBE) and explain the alignment between learning objectives, outcomes, and assessments.
Learners can apply mathematical concepts to real-world cases using active learning strategies (problem-solving, collaborative learning, etc.).
Learners can continuously improve learning outcomes based on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
